title:
Cities are Neighborhoods/Neighborhoods are People/Conserve Neighborhoods
[National Endowment for the Arts Poster]
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
description: An aeriel view of a city rendered in dark matte gray, black and white.  The image of the city skyline appears at the extreme upper portion of the sheet against a black sky. The image is a negative print from a photographic positive and gives the appearence of dissolution. At top right,  title appears in white letters.
name: Poster
